problem.purpose: Defines the problem to be solved
problem.summary: Install Alpine.JS within my Shopify Liquid theme without being render blocking at all
problem.detailed-description: I would like to use Alpine.JS throughout my website but I do not want it to have any performance impacts (currently the site is 100/100) from importing the library
problem.objective: Have Alpine.JS in my Shopify Liquid theme without being render blocking or reducing lighthouse score

context.purpose: Provides technology context, constraints and existing code

success-criteria.purpose: Defines how to measure the success of the solution

functional-requirements.requirement: Alpine.JS installed in the Shopify Liquid theme without performance impact at all

test-case.description: Add a very basic toggle button using Alpine.JS to prove that the library is installed and working
test-case.action: Create a button that toggles some message on or off using Alpine.JS
test-case.expected-outcome: Clicking the button will toggle on or off the message with Alpine.JS
